## BasicTableMetadata interface

Basic table metadata, contains columns

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BasicTableMetadata<TColumn extends GridColumn> extends GatheredMetadata 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [columns](./grid.basictablemetadata.columns.md) | <code>TColumn[]</code> | Array of columns gathered |
